alert.note: Alert for Hanson; McCook (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 5:46PM MDT until April 12 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... East central Hanson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 646 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Emery, or 19 miles west of Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Salem around 655 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
